top.title: Children among 25 killed in one of Russia's deadliest strikes on western Ukraine
top.summary: Two blocks of flats were attacked in the western city of Ternopil. One was almost destroyed.

top.title: 'Things happen' - Trump defends Saudi crown prince over Khashoggi killing
top.summary: The US president's claims that the crown prince "knew nothing" contradict the CIA's own assessment.

top.title: Klimt painting second most expensive artwork sold at auction
top.summary: The portrait of Austrian heiress Elisabeth Lederer was looted by the Nazis and almost destroyed.

top.title: Judge rules Meta doesn't have monopoly after Instagram, WhatsApp acquisitions
top.summary: The decision allows Instagram's parent company to avoid the prospect of the company breaking up

top.title: Baby Shark: How a 90-second clip created a $400m business
top.summary: Shares in the firm behind the highly-addictive children's song rose by more than 9% in their stock market debut.

top.title: Roblox blocks children from chatting to adult strangers
top.summary: One of the world's most popular gaming platforms has faced criticism for its child safety record.

title.#text: TikTok is letting users control how much AI content they see
